revision.text: Possibly: Of the origin and progress of language, by James Burnett, Lord Monboddo. 6v. (Edinburgh : Printed for A. Kincaid & W. Creech; and T. Cadell, in the Strand, London, MDCCLXXIII [1773-1792]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1298282~S1
